TopicTitle: I liked 'The Lounge' better than 'General Discussion'.

Articles.Content:
It's pretty simple, really. I liked it when the lounge was called 'The Lounge'. Now it's called 'General Discussion' and that feels kind of boring to me. Feel free to discuss.

Edited April 13, 2016 by cubinator
Agreed
I think the lounge sounded better.
I agree, the lounge sounded better. But I don't think we're going to get a representative poll here.
The lounge has this..."chill" vibe to it. General Discussion is a bit too generic and bland. But well, as long as it works!
Why *did* they change it?

Was an april's fool joke when they swap the lounge with general discussion, then they probably figure renaming the lounge to general discussion while the old general discussion being "KSP Discussion" is more appropriate and have less people posting non-ksp stuff in it. So now it sticks.

I wanted to make a topic: "Things we do and make beside KSP", but found the lounge is gone....

 

I'm gonna call agent Cooper...

Its now General Discussion...soo yeah

*thumbs up* 

Edited April 14, 2016 by Atlas2342

1 minute ago, Atlas2342 said:

Its now General Discussion...soo yeah

Thanks, guess I'll have to miss the cherry pie and the log lady then....
if i am not mistaken it was an april fools thing, seeing as it was gone April 2nd. things are as they were before 4-1-16 and as they are now after it.
Triop, it seems you will wish to cast a 'yes' vote in the poll to which your thread has been appended.

I don't care what any of the forums are named so long as I can find a place to put my posts. If it's a general piece of discussion, then I suppose General Discussion is a good place for it.

I don't think I've ever been not lounging while browsing the forums, so that seems more vague.
yeah I prefered this being "the lounge" and I prefered "KSP Discussion" being called "General Discussion" (plus GD was nicer to use as an acronym than KD).

Ok, so now I'm noticing the same thing that was happening with General KSP Discussion happening in whatever we're calling the off-topic forum now-people are posting in the wrong forum...  Maybe remove the general part again?  Maybe have it just literally called Off Topic?

hum, why not /rename the "Geneloungdry Discussnot" (the best place to wash words at each others together )?

*pompompom*

yeah yeah yeah ... dictionnaries are not up to date once more, but i like cavern painting ; ) and X-words mutations over time thanks to Prof. Xavier.

Edited April 20, 2016 by WinkAllKerb''
Seems like we got the lounge back.

34 minutes ago, RainDreamer said:

Seems like we got the lounge back.

must be the longest april fools joke ever, then. well played, @sal_vager.

It was also a test, on this and other forums the spambots will target sections containing the words "General" and "Discussion" in the title.

So now we have the Lounge back, but we'll keep KSP Discussion rather than reverting the name to General.

6 hours ago, sal_vager said:

It was also a test, on this and other forums the spambots will target sections containing the words "General" and "Discussion" it the title.

So now we have the Lounge back, but we'll keep KSP Discussion rather than reverting the name to General.

Yay! It's back!
